actions.name: Slow Start
actions.description: Effect: The user's default ATK and SPD Stages are -4. After each of the user's Activations, the user's default ATK and SPD Stage increase by 1.

system.description: Effect: The user's default ATK and SPD Stages are -4. After each of the user's Activations, the user's default ATK and SPD Stage increase by 1.
